body_html: It used to be ok for nvprof checkpoints, because it was only used to translate a string table i.e. one run for each kind of a Function that was used. Right now it's once per event, so it's too much.
body_text: It used to be ok for nvprof checkpoints, because it was only used to translate a string table i.e. one run for each kind of a Function that was used. Right now it's once per event, so it's too much.
body: It used to be ok for nvprof checkpoints, because it was only used to translate a string table i.e. one run for each kind of a Function that was used. Right now it's once per event, so it's too much.
